Package io.github.neonorbit.dexplore.task

Class TaskHandler<V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.neonorbit.dexplore.task.TaskHandler<V>
  • @Internal
public final class TaskHandler<V>
extends java.lang.Object
    This is an internal API.

    A single instance of this class should not be used from multiple threads. Only pause() and resume() are thread safe.
